## Gramophone Record
### 1930
A 10-inch 78rpm gramophone record (a) with a cardboard sleeve (b), found inside a gramophone cabinet (Y: 85/5/1) used on board RRS Discovery II 1929-33. Side A is 'Gettin' Sentimental' performed by the BBC Dance Orchestra under the direction of Henry Hall, with vocal chorus. Side B is 'By the Sycamore Tree' performed by the BBC Dance Orchestra under the direction of Henry Hall, with vocal chorus.
